name: Cat Ba Central Sea View - Hoang Ngoc Hotel
address: 245 Đường 1/4, Đảo Cát Bà, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm cách Bãi biển Cat Co 1 7 phút đi bộ, Cat Ba Central Sea View - Hoang Ngoc Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 3 sao ở Đảo Cát Bà, đồng thời có sân hiên, nhà hàng và quầy bar. Với khu vực bãi biển riêng, khách sạn nằm gần một số điểm tham quan nổi tiếng, cách Bãi biển Cát Cò 2 8 phút đi bộ, Bãi biển Cat Co 3 1.2 km và Cannon Fort 19 phút đi bộ. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách tại khách sạn có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng kiểu lục địa hoặc kiểu Á.

Cat Ba Central Sea View - Hoang Ngoc Hotel cách Ben Beo Harbour 2 km và Hospital Cave 8.5 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách chỗ nghỉ 54 km.

review.rating: wonderful host on a beautiful island
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Our host, Alex, was fabulous - always going the extra mile and being extremely helpful with everything. He booked us a fantastic cruise, transport from and to Hanoi, gave us unlimited free bottled wated and always answered all concerns very quickly. All our group loved him and felt very welcome. 
The sea view rooms have amazing vistas over the ocean - we saw a couple of superb sun rises. The beds are comfortable and there's enough space. The bathrooms are basic but functional. The hotel is centrally located and Cat Ba is a wonderful place.
review.comment_negative: The place is a bit run down and rough around the edges, a work in progress. The Vietnamese breakfast was great, according to the people in our group who tried it but the Western breakfast options were not so much to our taste. There was no salt on the eggs and too much oil. A very loud propaganda speaker (we think) starts his day at 6.00 o'clock in front of the hotel -  it affected us as we had views across the front and the sea. Our daughter, in a room with a view of mountains, wasn't disturbed. Different things didn't work at different times but Alex was quick to put them all right.

review.rating: wonderful host on a beautiful island
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Our host, Alex, was fabulous - always going the extra mile and being extremely helpful with everything. He booked us a fantastic cruise, transport from and to Hanoi, gave us unlimited free bottled wated and always answered all concerns very quickly. All our group loved him and felt very welcome. 
The sea view rooms have amazing vistas over the ocean - we saw a couple of superb sun rises. The beds are comfortable and there's enough space. The bathrooms are basic but functional. The hotel is centrally located and Cat Ba is a wonderful place.
review.comment_negative: The place is a bit run down and rough around the edges, a work in progress. The Vietnamese breakfast was great, according to the people in our group who tried it but the Western breakfast options were not so much to our taste. There was no salt on the eggs and too much oil. A very loud propaganda speaker (we think) starts his day at 6.00 o'clock in front of the hotel -  it affected us as we had views across the front and the sea. Our daughter, in a room with a view of mountains, wasn't disturbed. Different things didn't work at different times but Alex was quick to put them all right.
